title: Check and submit
respondentSelfAssignmentInfo: You must enter the claimant and respondent details exactly as they're written on the case, including any mistakes. For example, if the client's last name is Smyth but it has been spelled 'Smith', you should enter Smith.

confirmation.title: I confirm all these details are accurate and match what is written on the case.

satisfied: You're satisfied that all these details are accurate and match what is written on the case

hiddenErrorField.api: Unable to assign role. Please try again later
hiddenErrorField.caseAlreadyAssignedToSameUser: You have already assigned to this case
hiddenErrorField.caseAlreadyAssigned: Case has already assigned to a respondent
